text: Charlie Thomas Cox (born 15 December 1982) is an English actor. He is best known for playing Matt Murdock / Daredevil in the TV series Daredevil (2015â€“2018), The Defenders (2017), Echo (2024) and the movie Spider-Man: No Way Home (2021). ==References== Category:1982 births Category:Living people Category:English movie actors Category:English television actors Category:English stage actors Category:English voice actors Category:Actors from London
